summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It shows inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster with several inmate names. The documents are routine prison administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: BULLOCK

events.title: Inmate Hospital Roster

events.title: Prison Out Count
events.description: Official out count conducted at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York showing inmate population by housing unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document shows prison administrative records from August 9-10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Includes an inmate hospital roster with four named inmates: BULLOCK, DECAPUA, DANA-PINEDA, and MCDUFFIE.
Shows inmate population counts by housing unit with a total of 758 inmates counted on August 10, 2019.
These are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative documents with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or his case.
The documents demonstrate standard prison operations including inmate counts and hospital assignments.
